name: Frontend Team
description: Responsible for building and maintaining the user interface and frontend components of the application.

name: Backend Team
description: Handles server-side development, API creation, database management, and infrastructure.

name: DevOps Team
description: Manages deployment, continuous integration, cloud infrastructure, and system monitoring.

name: QA & Testing
description: Ensures quality assurance through comprehensive testing and bug reporting.

name: Product Management
description: Defines product strategy, roadmap, and coordinates with all teams on priorities.

name: Security Team
description: Focuses on security audits, penetration testing, and protecting user data.
